containing_words.word: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

sentences.english: Emancipating the mind and run through the infiltration of socialism with Chinese characteristics in all levels.
sentences.chinese: 解放思想贯穿于渗透于中国特色社会主义的各个层面。

sentences.english: The establishment of Deng Yan Das thought on socialism has been a long process.
sentences.chinese: 邓演达社会主义思想的形成经历了一个过程。

sentences.english: Socialist organizations called for the culprits to be hunted down.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义团体呼吁将这些犯人缉拿归案。

sentences.english: At the 4th chapter exploration build socialism politics civilization essential way.
sentences.chinese: 第4章，探索建设社会主义政治文明的基本途径。

sentences.english: The slogan of Harmonious Society has strong flavors in Confucianism and Socialism.
sentences.chinese: 和谐社会的口号和儒教及社会主义相当对味。

sentences.english: Efacropoliss to build a new left-wing countryancillary will accomplish cogent advance.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义新乡村建设获得重大进展。

sentences.english: Only by sticking to the socialist road can we do away with the root cause of poverty. (p. 330)
sentences.chinese: 只有坚定走社会主义门路才华挖失落穷根。

sentences.english: That is also the the value of researching eco-socialism.
sentences.chinese: 这也是研究生态社会主义的价值所在。

sentences.english: Socialist realism is undoubtedly the result of imagining collectively, worth reviewing.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义现实主义无疑是集体想像的结果，值得反思。

sentences.english: The construction of socialism new countryside must have the good leaders.
sentences.chinese: 建设社会主义新农村，要有好的带头人。

sentences.english: The stock market in China has developed in tandem with the development of the socialist market economy. The securities market has made an important contribution to the economic growth of China.
sentences.chinese: 中国的股市同中国社会主义市场经济一起开始发展。

sentences.english: It is our basic line to carry out socialist modernization.
sentences.chinese: 搞社会主义现代化建设是基本路线。

sentences.english: Socialism represents an inexorable law in the historical evolution.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义是历史发展的必然规律。

sentences.english: Some might deride this as socialism.
sentences.chinese: 有些人可能会嘲笑这是社会主义。

sentences.english: Without democracy, there can be no socialist modernization.
sentences.chinese: 没有民主就没有社会主义现代化。

sentences.english: Is non-public ownership compatible with socialism? the traditional answer is negative.
sentences.chinese: 非公有制经济同社会主义相容吗？

pinyin: guo2 jia1 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4
